Name: Ruvato: Original Complex
About the game: Ruvato: Original Complex is a fast-paced hack and slash game. Ria, the protagonist of this game, gains attack power and becomes stronger each time she defeats her enemy. Play, get skilled, and chain-kill multiple enemies with ease using Riaâ€™s unique ability. Key Features * Unique system: Defeat an enemy or parry their attacks to become stronger. * Easy to learn, hard to master. * Over 100 action-packed levels with added platforming. * Various achievements. * Steam Cloud support. * Optimized for gamepad.
